column2: At the end of a long siege, soldiers drag you out of your hiding spot.
You capture [From.GetBestName] in the midst of the siege. What do you want to do with [From.GetHerHim]?
[target_imprisoned_and_converted.GetBestName] has been imprisoned and converted by sword by [target_imprisoner.GetBestName] after a siege.
[target_imprisoned.GetBestName] has been imprisoned by [target_imprisoner.GetBestName] after a siege.
[target_executed.GetBestName] is dragged from [target_executed.GetHerHis] hiding place after a siege and beheaded on the order of [target_killer.GetBestName].
After abandoning your faith under duress, it may be hard for anyone to trust you again.
Executed a Family Member After Siege
